dicomDescription.title: PDQ Service Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the PDQ Service

dcmTag.title: Patient Attributes
dcmTag.description: Queried Patient Attributes - if not specified all available Patient attributes will be queried

dcmDefaultCharacterSet.title: Default Character Set
dcmDefaultCharacterSet.description: Value of Specific Character Set (0008,0005) added to Data Sets without Specific Character Set (0008,0005) attribute received from the DICOM Patient Root Query C-FIND SCP. Only effective for DICOM PDQ Services (URI: pdq-dicom:{AETitle})
